description: Enterprise reporting table for patient education point items in the Patient Education (PED) master file.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The Unique ID for the Patient Education Record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line count for the Patient education point data.

columns.name: PAT_POINT_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient education points.

columns.name: PAT_PNT_TOPIC_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient education topic to which this point is attached to. it is stored in internal format and can be used to link to the teaching topic (IED) master file.

columns.name: PAT_PNT_TITLE_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient education title to which the point is attached to. It is stored in internal format and can be used to link to the teaching title (IED) master file.

columns.name: PAT_PNT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
A category item that specifies each point's status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Resolved


Deleted

columns.name: PAT_POINT_KEY
columns.description: The education point key for patient education record. This is a string of Title^Topic^Point

columns.name: POINT_IED_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient education points. It is stored in internal format and can be used to link to the teaching point (IED) master file.

columns.name: MY_POINT_HNO_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record associated for a My Point. My Point is a patient education point created on the fly and does not have an IED record associated with it.

columns.name: MY_POINT_HNO_DAT
columns.description: The contact date for the note record associated for a My Point. My Point is a patient education point created on the fly and does not have an IED record associated with it.

columns.name: POINT_FIRST_DOSE_MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication record associated with a first-dose education point. This is blank for points that are not associated with first-dose education for a medication.
